synopsis: Arriving late for work is no way to start your first day at a new job. Neither is getting pulled over by your future partner. Natsumi Tsujimoto is not having the best first day with the Bokuto Police Traffic Division.

What is it about bad weather that turns ordinary people into drivers from Hell? With severe weather on its way, Natsumi and Miyuki are trying their hardest to shelter their city from the sudden downpour of reckless drivers.

Confusion and gossip collide in Ken and Miyuki's relationship. He hears that she is going to a matchmaking session and she sees him coming back from an early morning trip with Natsumi! What's really going on?
Natsumi has been offered a job outside of Bokuto Station and decides to give it a try. Why would Natsumi just leave and how will Miyuki adjust to her new carsick partner?
